title: Echo
lyrics: neo gateun namjaneun cheoeumiya nae mameul seollege hamyeonseodo na ppaego dareun yeojal saenggakae modeun ge nae nuneneun boindago yeojadeureun ni kkeo ran saenggak modu neoreul joahal kkeo raneun chakkak juwi joeun saramdeureun modu da manggak yeogi e jeogie neoye dalkomhan maldeuri ..Echo echo echo echo neoye moksoriga nal jakku gweropijana Like a Echo echo echo in my mind aereul sseugo inneunde maga boryeo haenneunde Like a Echo echo echo echo nal hyang han ge aninde babo gachi wae geurae Like a Echo echo echo in my brain naege haneun mal gatjana niga geuman joajeotjana nunchido eomneun geon jweingeol amuri sogeuroman wecheo bwado deulliji anneun geon beoringeol hajiman pogido shwipjineun ana jibeul naseomyeon jage op shijak jina ganeun yeojadeureun modu myeongjak geureodaga geollimyeon baro sujak yeogi e jeogie neoye dalkomhan maldeuri ..Echo echo echo echo neoye moksoriga nal jakku gweropijana Like a Echo echo echo in my mind aereul sseugo inneunde maga boryeo haenneunde Like a Echo echo echo echo nal hyanghan ge aninde babo gachi wae geurae Like a Echo echo echo in my brain naege haneun mal gatjana niga geuman joajeotjana na wa geuga jaldwegireul barashineun bundeureun Put your hands up, put your hands up geu ga naege han geoboda jalhae jul su inneun bun Put your hands up, put your hands up ..Echo echo echo echo neoye moksoriga nal jakku gweropijana Like a Echo echo echo in my mind aereul sseugo inneunde maga boryeo haenneunde Like a Echo echo echo echo nal hyanghan ge aninde babo gachi wae geurae Like a Echo echo echo echo neo ye moksoriga jakku gweropijana Echo echo echo echo i baramdungiya naege do jom jalhae bwa Echo echo echo echo Echo echo
